articles.author: Katie Balevic
articles.title: World Health Organization says monkeypox outbreak a global emergency
articles.description: The WHO declared the monkeypox outbreak, which has been detected in over 70 countries, an "extraordinary event"— requiring a unified global response.
articles.content:
The World Health Organization on Saturday declared the monkeypox outbreak, which has spread to over 70 countries, a global health emergency.

articles.title: Passenger spent night on a sleeper train but it never left the station
articles.description: Jim Metcalfe boarded the Caledonian Sleeper in Glasgow and expected to wake up in London, but found it had not left the station – and no one was told.
articles.content:
A passenger spent the night on a sleeper train and woke up hours later to find it had never left the station.
